summary:
Sales | Customer experience | B2B | Account manager | Lead generation | Business strategy | Logistic | Supply Chain | International Business development 

Sale professional, working for international companies. Responsible for initiating sales process by cold-calling, scheduling meetings, making initial presentations, visiting customers, and understanding account requirements to ensure expansion. Skilled in negotiation, sales planning, territory management, prospecting, and lead generation.

10 + years of experience as a Key Account Manager. With specialization in Business Management (ESPM University, Brazil), and a Bachelor of Business Administration (FIG University, Brazil). Fluent in Portuguese and English. Currently studying Dutch. International Experienced gained after working abroad (Japan, April 2015).

Customer-oriented professional, developing sales channels, managing the lead generation, and expansion strategy in the EMEA and LATAM regions. Focus on strategic sales (SPIN Method), to ensure customers' needs and requirements are met. Responsible for driving partnerships with local and global companies increasing a wide range of products lines. Previous experience as a business owner, taking care of different facets of the business (HR, Marketing, Operations, and Sales).

Seeking to develop new partner relationships. Aiming to gain experience working with international colleagues, preparation, and developing creative/alternative approaches to problem solutions. Creating new opportunities for existing and new customers, identifying trends, and marketing strategies for the industry. Current exploring new opportunities.

💪𝗔𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘁𝗶𝘀𝗲:
► Strategic Prospecting Skills 
► Rapport Building on the Call 
► Lead Qualification
► Strategic Selling (SPIN Selling)
► Salesforce, Dynamics CRM, and Oracle.

𝗘𝗨 𝗩𝗶𝘀𝗮 | 𝗥𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝘁𝗼 𝗟𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸
Do not hesitate to contact me:
☎ +31 6 38633726
💬 WhatsApp + 31 6 38633726
✉ tatinas2012@hotmail.com
📍Location: Enschede - The Netherlands

profile_positions.description:
Managing the store operations daily.
Training and supervising the employees.
Providing assistance with marketing events, digital media, and products launch for the brands.  
Handling complaints, and reacting to consumer demands.
Developing positive relationships with vendors of jewelry, clothes, crafted works, cosmetics.
profile_positions.title: Business Owner

profile_positions.description:
Receiving and inspecting IKEA shipments.
Unpacking and rearranging things on shelves, as well as signing delivery notes and handling merchandise, especially when it's fragile.
Load stock in preparation for clients' orders. 
Maintaining a clean, sanitary, and well-organized environment.
Ensure the proper review, verification, and reconciliation of shipping documents.
Meeting with the team to prepare complex databases, reports, and/or presentation material for the logistics unit.
Achievements: 
Improved my Dutch language skills.
Expand my acknowledgment in the logistics process.
profile_positions.title: Logistic assistant

profile_positions.description:
Supporting various ongoing expansion projects, conducting and documenting market and business research.
Liaising with various internal teams and stakeholders as needed to carry out projects, selling forklift machines, and analyzing sales options.
Expand Toyota products within industry solutions, increase revenue, negotiate and manage partner contracts.
The first point of contact for partners both internal and external, developing joint go to the market plans through SalesForce System.
Create and adopt new best practices to scale the product regionally.
Working with cross-functional teams to create and execute strategic business plans, practice development, and marketing, to execute achievement against partner goals.
Achievements: 
Awarded 2015 for Best Sale Performance in LATAM.
Increased 30% the sales in my region.
Participation in 4 trade fairs as a Toyota representative. 
Visited the Toyota manufacturers in Japan (Forklift & Cars)
profile_positions.title: Senior Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
Prospecting for new customers in the LATAM market by networking, cold calling, working with marketing, and other means of generating interest from potential customers.
Develop a rapport with new customers, set targets for sales, and provide the support that will continually improve the relationship.
Creating a pipeline of new business, thorough knowledge of the market, the solutions/services Andreani can provide. 
Ensuring a strong pipeline of opportunities, which includes portfolio management, prospecting for new customers, knowledge of logistics and transportation solutions, and managing large accounts
Achievements: 
Increased 50% of the new warehouse in São Paulo.
profile_positions.title: Executive Account Representative

profile_positions.description:
Developing strong relationships with partners, working with clients to identify new and ongoing requirements, introducing new products or services. Attending Industry Electronics meetings. 
Building a robust healthy pipeline through inbound and outbound prospecting to identify new business.
 Effectively communicate McLane's value proposition while identifying advanced opportunities through the sales cycle.
 Using cold-calling, prospecting email campaigns, and other in-house sales development best practices to develop and qualify prospects and maintain a strong customer base in the freight field. 
Maintaining metrics to meet weekly targets, such as the number of qualified leads and lead conversion rates. Experience with CRM Dynamics, SalesForce, and Oracle. 
The key point of contact between McLane and its customers: answering queries, offering advice, and introducing new products via the SPIN technique
profile_positions.title: Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
Identify inventory reduction In the IT division, and coordinate actions with logistics operators. 
Staying updated regarding industry standards, trends, and practices to spot changes in logistics planning and execution.
Enter logistics into databases in order to keep payment systems up to date and verify that vendor payments are accurate. 
Creating freight rate databases for supply chain departments to utilize in determining the most cost-effective forms of transport. 
Determine material availability by contacting relevant vendors, Inquire about rates and timetables with carriers. 
Ensure that product flow is consistent from start to finish at Samsung Electronics
profile_positions.title: Logistics Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Schedule shipments, negotiate rates with local carriers, and hiring of transport. 
Promoting training with other departments to better explain the shipping process and regulatory requirements.
Support the Logistic Manager in achieving SYN da Amazonia goals, while offering ideas for continual process improvements. 
Managing a team of 5 to ensure common objectives are accomplished. 
Assist with the billing shipping day-to-day activities. 
Establishing and sustaining positive working relationships with internal departments and/or vendors
profile_positions.title: Freight Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Manage the implementation of the operational structure for new customers and product representation, as well as the planning of quality communication. 
Researching freight carriers, assisting with the implementation of new clients, and specifications on billing shipments 
Work on international accounts, meet with the team and perform freight analysis to reduce overall costs. 
Conducting qualitative and quantitative analysis of logistics operations using simulation models and other tools.
 Review DHL inventory accountability at the warehouse. 
Organizing the travel plan and the charge per unit of the freight
profile_positions.title: Freight Rate Analyst
